title: AVAST: Changes in working hours and employee involvement
title_national_language: Změny v pracovní době a zainteresování zaměstnanců ve firmě AVAST
status_of_regulation: New aspects included into existing measure
category: Promoting the economic, labour market and social recovery
background_info_description: The company [AVAST](https://www.avast.com/index#pc) is originally a Czech company producing software for computer security. The company offers its products to both corporate customers and households. The company was founded in 2010 as a successor to the Alwil Software cooperative, whose history dates back to 1988. The company's shares are traded on the Czech and London stock exchanges.
content_of_measure_description: At the beginning of the pandemic, all the company's employees switched to working from home. There were about 2,000 employees in all branches around the world. Since the end of May, in connection with the positive development of the situation in individual countries, the company has gradually opened offices for those employees who, for various reasons, could not or did not want to work from home and would like to return to the offices. In July, part of the staff had to return to work from home again due to the widespread COVID infection among employees. The company then conducted a survey among employees, where they could choose between the possibility of permanently working remotely in a place of their choice or working in offices in the company's building. According to the survey, 58% of employees would like to work from the office. This possibility also allows the employees to work from home but only one or two days a week. The remaining 42% of employees chose to work remotely with the option of choosing the location of the workplace. In this case, however, the employee loses the right to a fixed position in the office and is expected to come to it at most once a week.
use_of_measure_description: In addition to working from home, the innovations introduced by the company also include unlimited holidays. The company thus relies on the responsibility of employees to perform the agreed tasks within the agreed time horizon. At the same time, since the beginning of the year, the company has been trying to strengthen the involvement of employees by wanting to distribute shares worth approximately CZK 700 million (€27 million) among them. The number of shares allotted to each employee will be derived from the salary.
sectors: Computer programming, consultancy and related activities

                                                                                                                                      									 Premium                    					    Rušíme pracovní dobu. Práce odkudkoli znamená vyšší kvalitu, říká šéf Avastu                    							                        	                        					            				                     					 [POPISEK]„Je to do určité míry experiment, který počítá s tím, že když se dá lidem volnost a flexibilita, tak ji nebudou zneužívat,“ říká šéf Avastu Ondřej Vlček. 				| foto: Avast			 																    										        		            												 						                                      23. ledna 2021                Kanceláře softwarové firmy Avast zejí prázdnotou a ani po skončení pandemie se zcela nezaplní. Společnost se zhruba dvěma tisíci pracovníky zavádí nový koncept práce, lidé mohou pracovat odkudkoliv. „Ověřili jsme si, že to jde a je to lepší, protože lidé jsou spokojenější,“ říká šéf Avastu Ondřej Vlček.            		        	                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Zaměstnanci si podle Vlčka mohou lépe organizovat volný čas, mají ovšem i příležitost úplně změnit životní styl a třeba se odstěhovat do hor. K novinkám patří rovněž neomezená dovolená nebo zaměstnanecké akcie. „Nově udělené zaměstnanecké akcie mají hodnotu přes 700 milionů korun,“ uvádí Vlček.
